title: Saint Seiya: Legend of Sanctuary (2014) Blu-ray 1080 Needs subti
description:
In a remote mythological age, there were the defenders of the Goddess Athena. When the forces of evil threatening the world, these warriors of hope has always appeared. Nowadays, the young Saori Kido, owner of mysterious powers that knows, suffers a stroke and is saved by the Bronze Horseman Seiya. Since then Saori, who had begun to understand your destination, along with his Bronze Saints friends Seiya, Shun, Hyoga, Shiryu and Ikki decides to go to the shrine. But there, in addition to confront the pitfalls of the Master of the Sanctuary, they will face a mortal combat with the most powerful of the knights: the proud Gold Saints.	



Blu-ray Quality 1080p

I need help encoding and translating English subs so i am putting this up to the bay.

The original video was wrongly coded by mgt he made the audio separate from the video i just put them together. Again this is the blue ray release with Chinese subtitles and Japanese subtitles i need some one to translate the provided .srt to English so i can make an English one.

Also for some reason my VLC player (2.0.8) wont play the .mkv but i have found other players that will play it. i will include a codec pack to help (just in case)
